alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 4:09PM CDT until August 11 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Early County in southwestern Georgia... Quitman County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/. * At 508 PM EDT/408 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Cuthbert to near Fort Gaines to near Richards Crossroads, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Morgan, Headland, Georgetown, Blakely, Cuthbert, Edison, Arlington, Shellman, Leary, Kinsey, Douglasville, Newville, Bellville, Haleburg, Bluffton, Shorterville, Wire Bridge and Parksville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
